description.value: Commercially available in rolls of very thin wax-like solid; as solution (50-75%) in various solvents; [Merck Index] White waxy solid; [MSDSonline]

sourcesuses.value: Used as a wetting agent (industrial, pharmaceutical, cosmetic, and food applications), processing aid in the sugar industry, stabilizer for hydrophilic colloids, dispersant and emulsifier, and stool softener; Also used in powderless etching systems; [HSDB]

comments.value: In studies of rabbits, causes minor and reversible eye injury at concentrations of 0.5% and 2% and severe eye injury at concentrations of 10%; [HSDB] A strong eye irritant; May cause skin irritation by removal of natural oils; [CAMEO] An irritant; [MSDSonline] See "Docusate."

other_information.value: No other related information on this agent was found.
